name: BUZZ!: Quiz Player
description:
Become a trivia mastermind by downloading BUZZ!™: Quiz Player For Free!

The first downloadable BUZZ!™ game with both DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller and BUZZ!™ Buzzer support. Free to download and includes a starter pack of over 80 questions as well as sample questions from existing BUZZ!™ Quiz Packs available on the PlayStation®Store. BUZZ!™: Quiz Player is designed for users to purchase and play DLC Quiz Packs from the PlayStation®Store giving you hours of trivia fun with family and friends.

BUZZ! is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Relentless Software. © 2010 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.

DUALSHOCK is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other terms and conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not use this item.
